extendedInfo.description: Want to throw all the playful colors of the world on your facebook friends? Then try this colorful Holi app and that too FREE!  Happy Holi is a fun and highly entertaining app that allows you to color your friends picture, which you can pick from facebook, gallery or any folder of your phone.Holi is near to come & everyone is waiting for it eagerly. Now, color your friends through this free android application available in android market. Just select your friends picture, color them with your favorite color and share their picture with your other friends at your Facebook wall. Holi is a religious spring festival celebrated by Hindus, which involves family Gatherings, Holi Special Songs, various types of delicious holi dishes, colorful Gulaal , blasting water balloons and abeers all over the house and roads. We all spend time with our family, friends and have fun playing with colored powder, water balloons and sprinklers.,Holi is a festival of joy celebrated for the victory of good (Prahlad) over evil (Hirnayakahsyap).  Usually we greet your near and dear ones by sharing funny Holi sms, hoil wallpapers, sweets, colors etc. But, this time try something new, color them with your favorite colors and share their picture on Social Networking Sites through your Android Smartphone.Lets color your imaginations and get set to paint your friends in the colors of joy and excitement !! Features: 1. A very simple and classic yet addicting user interface.2. Simple and easy to use with astonishing graphics3. This app works well on tablets and phones.4. Hours to enjoy for FREE!! If you want to entertain your friends, family, lovers and co-workers and want to make them feel close to Holi, then this application is definitely for you. It can be a perfect gift for Hoil 2013!!Wish you very Happy Holi!
